name: RBX
description: A cornerstone of the Carbon ecosystem of products, the RBX token is used for general utility purposes across our multi-token staking platform, cross-chain DEX, leveraged liquidity pools, token launchpads, escrow tools, our decentralized fiat on/off ramp, and more. Holding RBX entitles you to rewards from the revenue generated across each and every product, special voting rights, exclusive seniority-based privileges, and the ability to directly burn your tokens into Ether through the use of our RBX Converter
